alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 3:20AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Monroe County through 345 AM CDT... At 320 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kolola Springs, or near Columbus AFB, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gattman, Binford, New Hamilton and Strong. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
